Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many cliches from that type and loves to point out it's Voorheesville New York setting with semi-funny but also stereotypical country bumpkin mannerisms .
